question: Analyze the social media engagement trends of companies across different platforms.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Gather engagement metrics for companies from each social media platform (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube).","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]},{"step":2,"task":"Compile the reach and engagement data to identify top-performing content by each company on these platforms.","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]},{"step":3,"task":"Classify engagement data by industry to evaluate trends across different sectors and identify patterns in social media usage.","table":["CompanyInfo","CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]},{"step":4,"task":"Compare engagement trends over time to assess how social media strategies evolve within companies. Include historical activity data if available.","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]}]
